channel.title: [Look] Sloppy Famas [Look]
channel.description: This model didn't take me this long, It's sloppy and i f***** it up at the end. I can do better but this was my first attempt at a gun. I know seems "square" and the barrel is messed up. This model contains : 2 primatives. Not that hard to spot them ;). I'm going to try full primative modeling soon. Also, i couldn't find/make any good textures. Anyways here it is. [img]http://i848.photobucket.com/albums/ab50/lost72/zxczczxc.jpg[/img] [img]http://i848.photobucket.com/albums/ab50/lost72/zxczxc.jpg[/img] [img]http://i848.photobucket.com/albums/ab50/lost72/zxczxczxczxc.jpg[/img] [img]http://i848.photobucket.com/albums/ab50/lost72/zxcxzxc.jpg[/img]

item.title: [Look] Sloppy Famas [Look]

item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

you dont model guns through trace… i mean, most of them come out lookinglike… that. guns need clean face structure. not random triangles
